mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu ( menu_code, parent_code, menu_name, button_code, menu_url, menu_icon, menu_sort, menu_type, perms, status, create_time, create_user ) values ( #{menuCode}, #{parentCode}, #{menuName}, #{buttonCode}, #{menuUrl}, #{menuIcon}, #{menuSort}, #{menuType}, #{perms}, #{status.value}, #{createTime}, #{createUser} )
mapper.update: update sys_menu set parent_code = #{parentCode}, menu_name = #{menuName}, button_code = #{buttonCode}, menu_url = #{menuUrl}, menu_icon = #{menuIcon}, menu_sort = #{menuSort}, menu_type = #{menuType}, perms = #{perms}, update_time = #{updateTime}, update_user = #{updateUser} where menu_code = #{menuCode}
mapper.select: select sm.menu_code menuCode, sm.menu_name menuName, sm.parent_code parentCode, sm.button_code buttonCode, sm.menu_url menuUrl, sm.menu_icon menuIcon, sm.menu_sort menuSort, sm.menu_type menuType, sm.perms perms from sys_menu sm inner join sys_role_menu AS srm ON srm.menu_code = sm.menu_code inner join sys_user_role AS sur ON sur.role_id = srm.role_id where sur.user_id = #{userId} and sm.status = 1
